title: Charmed
description: On a faraway planet...Jayne Ann Krentz writing as Jayne Castle, bestselling author of Zinnia, Amaryllis, and Orchid.In a legendary timeJulie Beard, bestselling author of Romance of the Rose and The Maiden's Heart.By a haunting presence...Lori Foster, one of Harlequin's most popular and acclaimed authors.With a dream of genie...Eileen Wilks, bestselling author of many Silhouette romances.
author: Jayne Castle
